reviews.review: This game is amazing, I won't spoil anything...

I am young, but I can tell you this is one of the greatest game of all time. I have never been able to decide which Portal game is better, but this game was a great sequel. Lots of series have a good first game and the next game ruin it, but this is the opposite of that. I LOVE THIS GAME.
no

A game which hides from the spotlight in comparison... HL2 andits community's wish for a sequel often overwhelm people who look at Valve's work. Often leading to a game which truly needs a sequel, deserves a sequel, not getting the backing it should. A storyline that is interwoven with that of the HL series, if anything the next game Valve makes, it should be the next in the Portal series, which could be the bridge between HL2 and its sequel.

Overall, this game is a must play for any and all, this game adds a lot to the story of the Portal/HL storyline.
         If like me you were left wanting after the credits rolled look at some of the best fanfiction I've ever read, Portal fanfiction.
Portal 2 es un juego que tenia desde hace mucho tiempo en mi biblioteca, siempre lo jugaba y terminaba una y otra vez por lo adictivo que es, un de los mejores juegos que ha hecho Valve

I have trouble deciding which is best, Portal 1 or Portal 2, this game made me have fun again playing games, the comedy takes a new view on games, the mechanics are awesome I wish they made a follow up, even if the mechanics are completly different, the story is so rich and full of fellings it made glued to the screen until I finished the game, it makes a perfect balance between challenge, reward and stories. And the song in the end is so awesome! It's a must play!
Great Coop!
Un juego increible que te hara abrir tu mente a las posibilidades y pensar de muchas maneras!!!!

Everything good about Portal made even better. Wonderful story mode, excellent puzzles, great new concepts. Still playing this masterpiece a five years after release, which is more than can be said for a lot of games. The level editor is an amazing new addition that truly sets this game over the top.
Simplemente perfecto

Excelente jogo de puzzle. Tem um modo multiplayer excelente, assim como uma história única
mükemmelsin!

[h1]Portal 2 is a fantastic game[/h1] One of the few sequels that provides more enjoyment than the first installment. It's funny, it's challenging, it has a great co-op and a great story and the PeTI is so much fun to play around in. It holds up fantastically and  honestly the only negative thing I could say about it is that the test chambers in the campaign are a bit anticlimactic the second or third time around, although you'll still struggle a bit on the later ones. 10/10 game, everyone should play it so that they know what to compare other games to in terms of universal likeability.
buradan nasıl çıkılır diye bir durup düşünmek isteyenler

Uma grande experiencia, jogabilidade bem particular que se une a uma historia especial na qual só a midia dos jogos eletronicos seria capaz de nos proporcionar. Se voce gosta de puzzles este jogo é indispensavel. Se não gosta, aprenda a gostar agora e de uma chance, não vai se arrepender...
A bit late to the party, but this game blew my mind! It builds on the success of its predecessor, and does so perfectly.
Plot wise and physically, a timeless masterpiece with excellent replay ability. Would recommend to anyone and everyone who has not yet played it.

There are so many things that can be said about this game...too many to put into one interview.

The co op adventures I've had with various friends. All of the thought that goes into every puzzle...and the utter frustration that comes with being stuck somewhere. The satisfaction as you move along through the story and the growing horror as it develops. [spoiler]The horror at Wheatley's betrayal. The satisfaction of shooting Wheatley to the moon.[/spoiler]The legends of a Portal 3 that never came to life, almost as strong as the Half Life 3 hype. The fact that this game is what got me into serious PC gaming and puzzle games in general.

This game overcomes the barriers of time to become a classic that every single person should play. You will not regret it.
爱死那个土豆了！！！

Portal 2 одна из лучших игр от Valve, в которой есть не только хорошие загадки, сюжет и проработанный мир,  дизайн уровней, но и душа. Всем советую пройти ее кто еще не прошел. Но обязательно стоит начат с Portal.

Valve are you still there? We all want portal 3, please take my money.

Simply one of the best games ever made. Fantastic puzzle game, genuinely hilarious, a worthy sequel and another great ending song.

And the co-op mode is simply the icing on the cake. Due to a headset issue me and my friend were unable to talk to each other... which only made it more fun. Trying to communicate with the basic points and signals available caused some amazing slapstick moments!

Played through this game 4 times on xbox.
Played through about 3 or 4 more times on pc.

This game is just amazing, I dont even think I can put it into words. This game has everything: Funny Parts, Sad Parts (Not as much as the funny parts, but hey), easy puzzles, extremley difficult puzzles that will make you rip out the hair straight off of your back.
If you've finished the campaign, I would go back through it for the achivements (Most of which are dead wasy and you will probably already have about 10 for just playing the game). Then go onto the multiplayer. The multiplayer expierence is overwhelmingly fun (As long as you're playing with someone who actually knows what they're doing).


If you have a PC and don't own this game, what are you doing with your life? It's cheap, even when not on sale. I would recommend buying the portal bundle though, its better value and has the predecessor to Portal 2, 'Portal'

This is probably one of the best games you will play, you will not regret your purchase at all.

I would give this game a straight up 10/10, and I can't say there are many games that I could give that sort of rating to.

The classic Valve puzzle game, portal 2. While not as iconic as its more dated counterpart the sequal did add a lot of incredibly useful things to the portal universe, and as such into the hands of creators. With the extra addition of Co-op and custom map creation the workshop is awash with incredibly clever maps for you and a buddy to tackle together, for science!

Ce jeu est génial, n'hésitez surtout pas à l'acheter, 5 ans après il est encore au goût du jour.

fora que ele tem um otimo plot twist

Ce jeu est juste génial ! C'est ma premiere critique et du coup je vais essayer d'etre quand meme objectif mais ce jeu ma rendu nostalgique du moment ou j'y jouait une semaine apres l'avoir terminé. ..
Bref point positif/negatif c'est parti

Positifs:  
-Une ambiance sonore et une bo tres approprié ( musique électronique pour rester dans le thème robot ect mais en accord avec le jeu) 
-Une histoire très prenante avec des rebondissements bien construit
-Un mechanisme de portail toujours aussi bien faite
-Un gros up graphique par rapport au 1
- des puzzle plus dur que le 1 et plus mindfuck ( pas ultra dur mais plus resolu en 10 seconde comme dans le 1 ) il faudra parfois vous poser pour trouver une solution
- une coop tres jouissive elle aussi
- un humour que perso j'adore !
- la musique de fin :)

Point négatif: 
- graphismes qui commence a vieillir 
- duré de vie pas enorme ( j'ai fini le jeu en 14 heure )

Au final je vous conseil vraiment ce jeu si vous aimer les jeux immersifs et qui n'est pas tout le temps dans l'action en plus comme il commence a dater en solde il passe a 4€ ça vaut vraiment le coup ! 

J'espere que cette critique vous a aidé et bon jeu !
非常好玩，就是有点头晕
gr8

Simplesmente fantástico. Vale a pena.
